desc: SwapTriplePos-Employee is a transformation method specially designed for employee relation. It deletes the TITLE description of each employee and keeps the original employee relation between the entity pairs.

examples.ori: Tim Cook, the director of Apple, was graduated from Auburn University.
examples.trans: Tim Cook of Apple was graduated from Auburn University.

examples.ori: `` We will continue to work closely with our colleagues affected by today 's announcement to help them through these changes over the coming year , '' said Mark Fisher , group integration director at Lloyds .
examples.trans: `` We will continue to work closely with our colleagues affected by today 's announcement to help them through these changes over the coming year , '' said Mark Fisher at Lloyds .
